correctResponse: Great Job! Let's try the next one
incorrectResponse: Nice try, but missed. Let's try again
completionQuote: You, have just completed this level.

questions.q: I don’t want someone to watch sports in bed.
questions.backgroundStory: Elizabeth Hurley once said, “I don’t want someone to watch sports in bed. That drives me nuts.”

questions.q: I grew up playing sports, football, basketball, baseball, everything, and acting was such a different environment and different world for me.
questions.backgroundStory: Cam Gigandet once said, “I grew up playing sports, football, basketball, baseball, everything, and acting was such a different environment and different world for me.”

questions.q: I never got into sports at all until i was in my early 20s.
questions.backgroundStory: Neal Schon once said, “I never got into sports at all until I was in my early 20s, after my music career got going.”

questions.q: Sports broadcasting is very open now.
questions.backgroundStory: Kirsty Gallacher once said, “Sports broadcasting is very open now. In the beginning you did encounter more traditional attitudes and get comments. But I’m talking about 12 years ago.”

questions.q: We all know that girls who compete in sports perform better in school.
